start.text: You are a jester in a royal court. The king is in a foul mood and you have to make him laugh. You can either tell a joke or perform a funny dance.

joke.text: You tell a hilarious joke and the king laughs. You have saved the day!

dance.text: You perform a ridiculous dance, but the king is not amused. He banishes you from the kingdom. Your adventure ends here.
